text: If I'm dealing with dictionaries everywhere, should I make them "classes"?
Right now, I have many python files.
I'm passing hash maps around everywhere.
Basic dictionaries, with a word as a key and a score as the value.
I'm also doing some more complicated strcutures, like:

if so, what would they be?
I don't do OOP very much so I'm asking these noob questions.
